note.p: Career: Professor of Natural Philosophy, in the University of Aberdeen; ex-Fellow and Lecturer, Corpus Christi College, Cambridge
Medals/Prizes: Hughes Medal 1939; Royal Medal 1949; Nobel Prize (Physics) 1937
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DSB vol 18 pp 908-912
AssocMaterial: CSAC 75/5/80. Papers deposited in Trinity College Library, Cambridge
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1977 vol 23 pp 529-556, plate, by P B Moon
